column1: Little Goat Diner////I had to think long and hard to choose my main course and debated heavily between the breakfast spaghetti
column3: and the corned beef hash. My server
column5: helped me narrow it down with a good description of the spaghetti and brandade but after seeing a few plates of hash leave the kitchen I feel he sold that one a bit short when he described it to me. I will definitely be back though and the hash is on my short list of things to try.
